title: Development of an Integrated Instructional Design System for Science Learning Environments [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and proficiency in fundamental digital device usage
context.additional_context: Learning a science curriculum-based instructional design system through practice-oriented activities, including digital device utilization

learning_goals: Learners can create an instructional design matrix by analyzing four educational issues: training scope, training location, transfer performance characteristics, and learning difficulty.
Learners can apply eight design elements—such as feedback delivery methods, practice structure, and modeling strategies—based on analysis results.
Learners can establish a data collection plan supporting instructional design elements through organizational and individual analyses.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
